meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7672.

td.p: Matt Brannagan, a high school history teacher from Bowie, Maryland
Lindsay Resnick, an archivist from Atlanta, Georgia
Brandon Brooks, an HR manager from Chicago, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $27,401)

tr.td: WHAT "A" COUNTRY?
SHOES
TOTALLY '80s WORDS!
POP CULTURE VILLAINS
BUGS MEANIE
LAX LUTHER
